00010 namespace PMT.Controls
00011 {
00012     public class HeaderControl : UserControl
00013     {
00014         protected Label userTypeLabel;
00015         protected Label PMTLabel;
00016         protected Label userNameLabel;
00017 
00018         private void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00019         {
00020             // Put user code to initialize the page here
00021             if(Context.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated)
00022             {
00023                 userTypeLabel.Text = Request.Cookies["user"]["role"];
00024                 
00025                 StringBuilder s = new StringBuilder();
00026                 s.Append("Welcome ");
00027                 s.Append(Request.Cookies["user"]["fname"]);
00028                 s.Append(" ");
00029                 s.Append(Request.Cookies["user"]["lname"]);
00030                 s.Append(", you are logged in as ");
00031                 s.Append(Request.Cookies["user"]["name"]);
00032                 s.Append(".");
00033 
00034                 userNameLabel.Text = s.ToString();
00035             }
00036             else
00037             {
00038                 userTypeLabel.Text = "";
00039                 userNameLabel.Text = "";
00040             }
00041         }
00042

00045         {
00046             //
00047             // CODEGEN: This call is required by the ASP.NET Web Form Designer.
00048             //

00051         }
